item.title: cant get mod working
item.author: invalid@example.com (theonlyeklipse)
item.dc:creator: theonlyeklipse
item.content:encoded:
iv put the files in the right spot n i downloaded a 2d map n put it in the maps section n when i load up ut04 which ever game type i got a map for there will be 2 modes for it like i get a BR map n put it in the map folder n when i load up ut04 theres 2 2d Bombing Run modes under custom game modes n both show all the normal maps n not the 2d maps n its the same wid any type i added a ctf map n it made 2 2dCtf modes udner custom games n both have the normal ctf maps in it,so i tryed renaming...

cant get mod working

item.title: 2D Tournament Lives!
item.author: invalid@example.com (FrozenCow)
item.dc:creator: FrozenCow
item.content:encoded:
Yes, 2D Tournament will live again! I contacted k0lpA if I could use his code to work on the UT2004's version and he was ok with that .
It's pretty close to finished at the moment, if it will be released it will be included in the Unreal4Ever package, it will not be released as a seperate 2DT mod.
This new version will include serveral new features:
  • New gametypes: Onslaught, Assault and it's also possible to play compatible custom gametypes from...

2D Tournament Lives!

Can't find 'index.ut2'".

Any help if anyone still comes here?

item.title: 2DT is dead. Modders wanted to carry on this great mod!
item.author: invalid@example.com (FreakinMeany)
item.dc:creator: FreakinMeany
item.content:encoded: K0lpA has stated many times that he will no longer work on the great 2D Tournament mod. If you're a modder interested in carrying on this great mod, please post here and let us know.

item.title: 2DT ported to UT2004
item.author: invalid@example.com (eggshen)
item.dc:creator: eggshen
item.content:encoded:
I saw the call for modders post on beyondunreal and was curious about what the mod looks like. I took the existing code and ported to 2k4. It's available here at:

http://s87030170.onlinehome.us/ut/

Unzip the .u* and .int files to system/. I only tested ctf and dm with bots so I'm not sure about other types. I didn't really do much except making it run under 2k4.

I hope this can generate more interest for the project.

item.title: I'm working on a 2D Sidescroller mod as well - Maybe we should join forces?
item.author: invalid@example.com (NickW)
item.dc:creator: NickW
item.content:encoded:
It appears that the makers of this mod and myself had similar and auspicious idea: Turn UT2004, one of the most advanced and capable game engines out right now, into a 2D sidescroller. We seem to have gone very different directions with the idea, but inevitably, I think our goals are the same.

Here is a description of my mod as it stands now...

Each player can select from one of three classes, Soldier, Scout or Engineer, and attempt to capture the opposing team's flag (Just like...

I'm working on a 2D Sidescroller mod as well - Maybe we should join forces?

item.title: feature request for the next 2d version
item.author: invalid@example.com (master_newbie)
item.dc:creator: master_newbie
item.content:encoded:
I think we should make a list if things we want to see in future 2d versions

then k0lpa has to start coding immediately and release it asap

- mutant gametype (with radar)
- working spectator mode
- fly redeemer in 2d
- fix animations (sometimes you see people walking backwards and shooting from their back etc.)
- radar for invasion
- (show 2d games in the serverbrowser under normal gametypes)
- reenable adrenaline moves (including pint sized and camouflaged)

item.title: 2DT has to go a new direction
item.author: invalid@example.com (O.S.T)
item.dc:creator: O.S.T
item.content:encoded:
I think 2dt has to go a new direction
now k0lp gave up, the mod has to go a new way with a new coder(I don't think a new coder would like to work on a mod named k0lpAs 2dt, I think a new coder would like to work on his own 2dt mod, based on k0lps mod)
maybe someone here can code,or someone here knows where we can ask for a new coder


how would you like to see the mod change?



I would like to see a 2dt with more action and diffrent weapons(not just ut in 2d,a bit more than...

2DT has to go a new direction

item.title: hey,look there,a new map!!1 ...hey...am I playing UT1?
item.author: invalid@example.com (O.S.T)
item.dc:creator: O.S.T
item.content:encoded:
wazzzup
I made a map today
the map existed 10 month ago,too,but then my pc deleted everything(not just the map),since then I had the map in my head; now it turned out to be bigger than I thought(I had to resize the map 3 or 4 times and don't want to do it again,even if it would be better for the gameplay)
the map is no eyecandy and has no static mesh,it looks a bit like a ut map
the map isn't ready yet: could someone please help me with the jumpspot paths? I made everything ready,but the...

hey,look there,a new map!!1 ...hey...am I playing UT1?

item.title: 17 maps and counting!
item.author: invalid@example.com (FreakinMeany)
item.dc:creator: FreakinMeany
item.content:encoded:
21 maps and counting!

You can download the latest version of the 2D Tournament mod and find links to all the 2DT maps at the official 2D Tournament web site:

http://www.2dtournament.com

---

I love this mod and I'm so glad that maps are still being made! There are now...

17 maps and counting!

item.title: k0lpa's used as a base for other mods?
item.author: invalid@example.com (shintree)
item.dc:creator: shintree
item.content:encoded: hello all. just came across K0lpas mod and gotta say its great!!! i am wondering if the code can be altered/added to, if credit is given in the readme and so on. I am a 3d artist with a few friends interested in doin up a level or 2 of a metal slug like game and would like to use this mod as a base. I looked in the readme for info on using the code but found none. Thanks in advance.
